urls.title: How to add an infant in my booking?
urls.description: 1. Go to Manage My Booking and click on ‘Manage’ for the particular booking you want to add an infant to 2. There, you will see an icon for ‘Manage Booking’ – click on that and go to 'Guest and Contact details' and 'Add Infant' 3. Select specific passenger to add the infant to 4. Fill in the following details: Name, Gender, Nationality, Date of Birth 5. Agree to the Terms & Conditions and click on ‘Continue’ 6. Seat Sum mary will be shown, confirm that this is accurate and click on ‘Continue’ 7. To
